研究发现 IL-24 增强 CAR-T 细胞疗法对抗癌症干细胞的有效性白介素 24 (IL-24) 对 CSC 和 CAR-T 细胞治疗的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Study-finds-interleukin-24-enhances-CAR-T-cell-therapys-effectness-against-cancer-stem-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Study-finds-interleukin-24-enhances-CAR-T-cell-therapys-effectness-against-cancer-stem-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e63471ff-6079-4185-b407-f736d600d581 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 05:07:00 -0500 Study finds interleukin-24 enhances CAR-T cell therapy's effectiveness against cancer stem cells
紧缩中的老龄化：研究将公共支出削减与脆弱性加剧联系起来英国紧缩公共支出的时期，标志着 50 岁及以上个人身体虚弱程度的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Ageing-in-austerity-Study-connects-public-spending-cuts-to-increased-frailty.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Ageing-in-austerity-Study-connects-public-spending-cuts-to-increased-frailty.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=031d2585-63d4-40e4-9fd0-63f25cc7f77d Wed, 14 Feb 2024 04:34:00 -0500 Ageing in austerity: Study connects public spending cuts to increased frailty

月经提前和更年期提前与慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD) 风险增加相关女性生殖因素与患慢性阻塞性肺病的风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Early-onset-of-menstruation-and-menopause-linked-with-increased-risk-of-COPD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Early-onset-of-menstruation-and-menopause-linked-with-increased-risk-of-COPD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=233f185e-28c2-4d0e-8527-dcdd7485ea81 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 03:22:00 -0500 Early onset of menstruation and menopause associated with increased risk of COPD
Revvity Signals Software 推出 Signals Clinical 解决方案，以加速关键临床试验洞察和数据驱动决策今天，Revvity, Inc. 宣布其软件和信息学部门 Revvity Signals 推出 Signals Clinical™ 解决方案，这是一个软件即服务 (SaaS) 的端到端临床数据科学平台，旨在集中所有数据临床试验数据，提供快速、可行的见解，以加快临床决策并加速治疗药物的市场交付。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Revity-Signals-Software-unveils-signals-clinical-solution-to-accelerate-ritic-clinical-trial-insights-and-data-driven-decisions。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Revity-Signals-Software-unveils-signals-clinical-solution-to-accelerate-ritic-clinical-trial-insights-and-data-driven-decisions。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c016255-e3b8-4b94-8766-3b9d511df413 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 00:19:00 -0500 Revvity Signals Software unveils Signals Clinical solution to accelerate critical clinical trial insights and data-driven decisions
情人节好消息：黑巧克力和香槟可以改善心脏健康这是您在情人节会喜欢的消息：一位领先的健康专家表示，您为爱人购买的黑巧克力和起泡酒也可能改善他们的心脏健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Good-news-for-Valentinee28099s-Day-Dark-chocolate-and-champagne-may-improve-heart-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Good-news-for-Valentinee28099s-Day-Dark-chocolate-and-champagne-may-improve-heart-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ec4dbac-6850-4863-89ee-786d002b0ca0 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 23:59:00 -0500 Good news for Valentine’s Day: Dark chocolate and champagne may improve heart health
新型人工智能驱动的蛋白质图谱工具优化癌症治疗科学家们开发了一种新的人工智能工具，可以绘制癌性肿瘤中蛋白质的功能图谱，使临床医生能够决定如何以更精确的方式进行针对性治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/New-AI-powered- Protein-mapping-tool-optimizes-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/New-AI-powered- Protein-mapping-tool-optimizes-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40949cde-7ee0-41bd-becd-46c1f7efef71 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 23:55:00 -0500 New AI-powered protein mapping tool optimizes cancer therapy

研究发现弹性素食饮食可降低心血管风险研究比较了弹性素食者、纯素食者和杂食者的心血管危险因素，发现植物性饮食可能带来显着的健康益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Flexarian-diet-linked-to-lower-cardioangiography-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Flexarian-diet-linked-to-lower-cardioangiography-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3b88667-df01-4bd8-ac6f-96fac96857e9 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 22:57:00 -0500 Flexitarian diet linked to lower cardiovascular risk, study finds
